attributes.title: I GOT SCAMMED!!! (NOT CLICKBAIT)
attributes.review: O MY GOSH YOU GUYS I GOT THIS APP TO DO A REVIEW ON MY TIK TOK ACCONT SO ADISON RAY AND DIXEY DIMILIO COULD SEE BUT I GOT SCAMMED😭. WHEN I OPENED THE APP TRUMP STARTED SCREAMING “YOU'RE FIRED! YOU'RE FIRED” AND THEN TOLD ME THAT HE HATES MINORITIES. BUT I DECIDED MAYBE IT WAS A JOKE SO I CONTINUED ON THE APP AND IT BROKE INTO MY PHONE AND TOOK ALL MY INFORMATION. THEY GOT MY PICTURES AND PASSWORDS. WHAT EVER HAPPEND TO PRIVACY AND MY FIRST AMENDMENT RIGHT. THEY STOLE MY CREDIT CARD INFO AND BOUGHT HILLARY CLINTON MERCH TO MY HOUSE AND NOW I HAVE TO WEAR IT BECAUSE BARRON AND MILANA BROKE INTO MY HOUSE AND STOLE MY CLOTHES. i still love 💕 barron tho uwu senpi 🥺👉👈

attributes.title: gen z ✨🧚🏻
attributes.review: the app promotes this cheeto looking guy 🤭🥵✨ and i think he’s kinda 🤏🏻🦐 if you know what i mean ✨🧚🏻 also just he is a big phat meanie pants 😤😡 and body shaming is never ok unless it’s about this oompa loompa looking man y’all call our president 😳😔🤮 and honestly that’s kinda mean to the oompa loompas 🤕🥺 sowwyyyy🙈✌🏻 but please #settleforbiden in november girly 🤩🌸💓🥰

attributes.title: It ran over me😔
attributes.review:
I am disgusted with this app❤️
It’s just so horrible
It ran me over while I was skating
It’s the worst app I DO NOT suggest this whatsoever
And plus it gave me rabies😆😆
